data.comment: The big names in today's match at Selhurst Park have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Jon Moss, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton at Selhurst Park.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 2, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Southampton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 4, In London, Jack Stephens (Southampton) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Southampton.
Jack Stephens is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 12, Jack Stephens for Southampton is back on the field again.
Jon Moss signals a Southampton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, Wilfried Zaha is on target to give Crystal Palace a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Andros Townsend.
Andros Townsend for Crystal Palace is whistled offside.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 18, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Jon Moss signals a Southampton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Southampton.
In the minute 20, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Crystal Palace in London.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Southampton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace push forward at Selhurst Park and Scott Dann gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Southampton defence.
In the minute 26, Jordan Ayew of Crystal Palace is pulled up for offside.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 28, Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a Southampton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In the minute 30, Jon Moss signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Southampton's half.
Danny Ings (Southampton) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Crystal Palace drive forward but Jordan Ayew is judged offside.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Southampton.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 35, Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Southampton.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 36, Cheikhou Kouyate gets his shot on target but fails to score for Crystal Palace.
Southampton have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Throw-in for Southampton at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Jeffrey Schlupp is booked for the home team.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 43, Jon Moss awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Jon Moss signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 45, Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Southampton pushes forward through Nathan Redmond, whose finish on goal is saved.
Southampton make their first substitution with Jannik Vestergaard replacing Jan Bednarek.
In the minute 48, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Southampton needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tyrick Mitchell for Crystal Palace who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 51, Kyle Walker-Peters (Southampton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Southampton's Che Adams gets in a shot on goal at Selhurst Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tyrick Mitchell is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 56, Danny Ings for Southampton drives towards goal at Selhurst Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Southampton's Nathan Redmond misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 58, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Southampton.
James McCarthy (Crystal Palace) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 60, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Jon Moss signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Southampton.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Southampton.
Can Southampton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 74, James Ward-Prowse of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jon Moss awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Roy Hodgson is making the team's first substitution at Selhurst Park with Luka Milivojevic replacing James McCarthy.
In the minute 77, Ralph Hasenhuttl (Southampton) is making a second substitution, with Moussa Djenepo replacing William Smallbone.
Wilfried Zaha for the home team is judged to be offside.
Eberechi Eze is replacing Jeffrey Schlupp for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Che Adams with Shane Long. This is the third substitution made today by Ralph Hasenhuttl.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
